meanings.definition: Inflicting severe pain or suffering on someone as a form of punishment or to force them to do or say something.
meanings.sent1: The torturing screams of the captured soldier echoed through the dungeon.
meanings.sent2: The torturing heat of the desert made it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent3: The torturing wait for the ice cream truck felt like an eternity.
meanings.sent4: The torturing memories of the war haunted him every night.
meanings.sent5: The torturing pain in her ankle made it impossible to walk.

meanings.definition: Causing someone extreme mental or physical pain.
meanings.sent1: The torturing thoughts kept him awake at night.
meanings.sent2: The torturing headache made it hard to focus on his work.
meanings.sent3: The torturing tickle fight with his little sister ended in laughter.
meanings.sent4: The torturing weight of his guilt pressed down on him relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: The torturing fear of spiders paralyzed her with terror.
